0e6b4c0f-d942-4aca-99fe-13f1899423ac.description: The Nutanix Technology Champion Elite program recognizes Nutanix enterprise cloud experts for their ongoing and consistent external contributions to the community and industry. The Nutanix Technology Champion Elite are our advocates and technology ambassadors who influence change with practical advice and bold ideas but who have also achieved their Nutanix Platform Expert (NPX) certification.
0e6b4c0f-d942-4aca-99fe-13f1899423ac.name: Nutanix Technology Champion - Elite (2020)

badge_template_activities.title: NTC Elite holders have achieved Nutanix Platform Expert (NPX) certification, are active on the Nutanix Community forums, helping others and contributing content, speak at industry user group and community events, have hands-on experience with Nutanix products and services, are active on social media and/or blogging, have a desire to give back to the community, create content from beginner to best practices that demonstrates how to develop, deploy, manage, and scale Nutanix environments
